data.expected_result: Message should be selected; should only open DM when actually touching the mention
data.short_description: Tapping and holding on (selecting) the empty space after a message that ends in a mention within a DM refreshes/re-opens the DM instead of selecting the message. Similarly, doing the same within a server opens the DM without actually touching the mention, but it's unclear whether that specific server behavior is intended.
data.steps_to_repro: - produce message with a mention at the end (or simply just a mention only) within a DM - try selecting the message in the empty space after the mention
